subdomains.name: Elementary Number Theory
subdomains.description: The basics — divisibility, primes, modular arithmetic. Accessible yet profound.
subdomains.flavor: The Outer Ring — where the prime stars shine brightest and every integer has a story.

topics.name: Divisibility & GCD
topics.description: Division algorithm, greatest common divisor, Euclidean algorithm, least common multiple.
topics.flavor: The oldest question in mathematics — does one number divide another?

topics.name: Prime Numbers
topics.description: The atoms of arithmetic. Fundamental theorem of arithmetic, sieve of Eratosthenes, prime distribution.
topics.flavor: Indivisible, unpredictable, infinite — the stars that light up number theory.

topics.name: Modular Arithmetic
topics.description: Clock arithmetic. Congruences, residues, Fermat's little theorem, Chinese remainder theorem.

topics.name: Diophantine Equations
topics.description: Equations requiring integer solutions. Linear Diophantine equations, Pythagorean triples.
topics.flavor: Only whole numbers allowed — suddenly everything becomes much harder.

subdomains.name: Algebraic Number Theory
subdomains.description: Number theory through the lens of algebra. Algebraic integers, number fields, ideal theory.
subdomains.flavor: The Inner Nebula — where numbers become algebraic objects of infinite complexity.

topics.name: Algebraic Integers
topics.description: Roots of monic polynomials with integer coefficients. Number rings and their arithmetic.
topics.flavor: Integers generalized — the building blocks of algebraic number fields.

topics.name: Quadratic Number Fields
topics.description: Fields of the form ℚ(√d). Class numbers, fundamental units, Pell's equation.
topics.flavor: The simplest number fields — yet they still hold unsolved mysteries.

subdomains.name: Analytic Number Theory
subdomains.description: Using analysis to study the distribution of primes. The Riemann zeta function and beyond.
subdomains.flavor: The Deep Core — where infinity meets the primes, and the Riemann Hypothesis waits.

topics.name: Distribution of Primes
topics.description: The prime counting function, prime number theorem, Chebyshev's bounds, prime gaps.
topics.flavor: How are the primes scattered? A question that connects analysis to arithmetic.

topics.name: Riemann Zeta Function
topics.description: ζ(s) = Σ 1/nˢ. Analytic continuation, functional equation, the Riemann Hypothesis.
topics.flavor: The most famous unsolved problem in mathematics lives here.
